== Introduction ==
Sabily is a set of packages that customizes the Ubuntu distro by installing Islamic software (prayer times, Quran study tool, web content filtering tool etc.) and by changing its design. 

== Contact Information ==
Web site: http://www.sabily.org

Mailing-lists:

 http://groups.google.com/group/sabily-users

 https://launchpad.net/~sabily.team for team members

Forum: http://sabily.org/forums

IRC channel: #sabily on freenode (or: http://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=sabily)

== Audience ==
Muslims
